|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 125 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV160CBTC-70G; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9812G6GH-75; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996I; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:02:CF |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = Bootbase;v1.06;; |stockos = ZyNOS;v3.40;; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 12 |pwr_ac_hz = 50 |pwr_amp_ac = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, J1 |jtag = yes,, JP3 |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = MitraStar |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/14/2007 |estreldate = 2005 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = ZyXEL G-663 |rad1modif = Mini PCI (VLYNQ) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1350A; |rad1chip2 = Texas Instruments;TNETW3422; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"45-401-000503" is silkscreened on the board (Rev1). *"[[CenturyLink EQ-660HW|45-401-000681]]" is silkscreened on the board (Rev2). {{see also|MitraStar|ZyXEL P660 series}} There are (at least) two versions of the board: * '''Rev1''': the WIFI module is connected to a mini-PCI slot, with [[TI]] chips. * '''Rev2''': the WIFI module is integrated into the main PCB, with [[Infineon]] chips. '''Note:''' The [[Infineon]] ([[Lantiq]]) PSB7200ZDW SoC is also known as [[TI]] AR7 :TNETD7200GDU. [[Infineon]] ([[Lantiq]]) PSB1350A aka [[TI]] TNETW1350A. The [[ZyXEL P-660HW-D1]] was an ADSL2+ wireless router widely :distributed by some ISPs like ''Telefónica'' (white enclosure). The PSU adapters used by the ZyXEL original (black enclosure) and :the one distributed by ''Telefónica'' (white enclosure) are different: * ''ZyXEL'' (black enclosure): ''12V AC 1A'' * ''Telefónica'' (white enclosure): ''16V AC 1A'' If you wanted to use a PSU with lower voltages than the original, :then a modification at the circuit with the voltage comparator IC (AS/LM393) should :be done, otherwise the CPU will keep in a reset state avoiding too boot the system. :Desoldering the R177 resistor near the LM393 IC should work. This way the R114 pullup resistor connected to the 74LV08 AND gate will (via another :AND gate) permanently pull the CPU and memory flash chip out of reset. ==Links of Interest== :[ftp://ftp.zyxel.com/P-660HW-D1/ ''ZyXEL'' manuals and firmwares] :[http://www.vaxination.ca/tcpip/zynos_commands.html ''CLI reference'' for ZyNOS and BootBase] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ===Boot log===
